title: PBS Wide Angle - Heart of Jenin.07.8.2009.WS-PDTV.XviD~Ekolb
description:
Wide Angle: Heart of Jenin

Heart of Jenin explores the tragic West Bank slaying of a 12-year-old Palestinian boy, killed by Israeli soldiers who mistook his toy gun for a real firearm, and the extraordinary act that followed: while overwhelmed with grief, his parents donated his organs to help save the lives of six Israeli youths.

Anchored by Aaron Brown, Wide Angle delivers reports from hot spots around the globe to give American viewers a forum for understanding the complex, dramatic, and explosive stories that are shaping the present and future of the world.
